variable.name: di1st2nd
variable.description: Administration sequence

variable.name: dib1
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: test urine 3-4 times/day

variable.name: dib10
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: do 3a.m. blood test once every 3 months

variable.name: dib11
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: collect capillary blood specimens 7/day, 1/3months

variable.name: dib12
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: administer insulin 1-2 times/day

variable.name: dib13
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: administer insulin 3-4 times/day

variable.name: dib14
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: administer insulin 4 times/day

variable.name: dib15
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: use insulin pump

variable.name: dib16
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: follow diet every day

variable.name: dib17
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: follow diet most days

variable.name: dib18
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: follow diet every meal

variable.name: dib19
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: follow diet 2 meals/day

variable.name: dib2
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: test urine at least twice/day

variable.name: dib20
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: follow diet 1 meal/day

variable.name: dib21
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: visit clinic every 3 months for 2 years

variable.name: dib22
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: visit clinic every month for 2 years

variable.name: dib23
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: visit clinic every week for 2 years

variable.name: dib24
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: keep daily records

variable.name: dib25
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: keep weekly records

variable.name: dib3
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: test urine at least once/day

variable.name: dib4
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: test for acetone at least once/day

variable.name: dib5
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: test blood 7 times/day

variable.name: dib6
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: test blood 4 times/day

variable.name: dib7
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: test blood 1-2 times/day

variable.name: dib8
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: do 3 a.m. blood test once/week

variable.name: dib9
variable.description: How certain (0=Very uncertain; 5=moderately certain; 10=very certain) are you that you will be able to carry out the following: do 3 a.m. blood test once/month

variable.name: dic1
variable.description: If assigned to the standard group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: test urine 3-4 times/day

variable.name: dic10
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: take insulin 3-4 times/day

variable.name: dic11
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: wear pump 24 hrs/day

variable.name: dic12
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: keep daily records

variable.name: dic13
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: visit every 3 months

variable.name: dic14
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: visit every month

variable.name: dic15
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: visit weekly

variable.name: dic16
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: collect capillary blood every 3 month

variable.name: dic17
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: follow diet

variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: take insulin 1-2 times/day

variable.description: If assigned to the standard group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: visit every 3 months

variable.name: dic5
variable.description: If assigned to the standard group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: collect capillary blood every 3 month

variable.name: dic6
variable.description: If assigned to the standard group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: follow diet

variable.name: dic7
variable.description: If assigned to the experimental group, how often (0%=Never; 50%=Half the time; 100%=Always) could you carry out the following: test blood 7 times/day
